IT Infrastructure Security

In this module you will learn about modern commercial networking infrastructure and how to secure it. By the end of the module, you will be able to design and configure a commercial network from scratch. The module goes beyond the theory and introduces not only design but also configuration and management of enterprise resources.

Learning Objectives:

+  Critically discuss the principles and concepts involved in the securing of information technology infrastructure for both stand-alone set-ups and networks.

+   Design a secure infrastructure and appraise the interrelationships among elements that comprise a modern security system.

+  Demonstrate an understanding of how to manage enterprise infrastructure services on modern operating systems.

+   Deploy and maintain a secure enterprise it infrastructure (network services) on Unix/Linux based systems.
